description: FastAPI route module defining the '/me' endpoint for retrieving current authenticated user profile information.

classes.name: UserMe
classes.description: Pydantic model for user profile response containing user id, email, full name, and mentor status.

methods.name: get_me(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint function that returns profile information for the currently authenticated user.

ctags.name: get_me
ctags.pattern: /^def get_me(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
